# Demonic (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Demogorgon, Fraz-Urb’luu, Graz’zt, Orcus, Yeenoghu |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You gain a +1 profane bonus on attack and damage rolls for unarmed strikes and attacks with natural weapons.

**Demonic Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Demonflesh (Spell)|Demonflesh]]****:** Caster gains +1 natural armor/5 caster levels.

**2** **[[Demoncall (Spell)|Demoncall]]****:** Caster gains +10 on one [[Knowledge (Domain)|Knowledge]] (the planes), [[Knowledge (Domain)|Knowledge]] (arcana), or [[Knowledge (Domain)|Knowledge]] (religion) check.

**3** **[[Demon Wings (Spell)|Demon Wings]]****:** Caster flies at his land speed.

**4** **[[Dimensional Anchor (Spell)|Dimensional Anchor]]****:** Bars extradimensional movement.

**5** **[[Planar Binding, Lesser (Spell)|Lesser Planar Binding]]****:** Traps outsider until it performs a task.

**6** **[[Planar Binding (Spell)|Planar Binding]]****:** As *[[Planar Binding, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar binding]]*, but up to 16 HD.

**7** **[[Fiendish Clarity (Spell)|Fiendish Clarity]]****:** Grants you darkvision 60 ft., allows you to see in magical darkness, *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]* out to 60 ft., and *[[Detect Good (Spell)|detect good]]*.

**8** **[[Utterdark (Spell)|Utterdark]]****:** 100-ft./level radius of darkness that evil creatures can see through.

   **[[Planar Binding, Greater (Spell)|Planar Binding, Greater]]****:** As *[[Planar Binding, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar binding]]*, but traps extraplanar creatures with up to 18 HD.

**9** **[[Gate (Spell)|Gate]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Connects two planes for travel or summoning.


| **Source:** | Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 81 |
|---|---|
| | Fiendish Codex I (WotC), pgs. 88-89 |
